title: Hello!
text:
Welcome to my webpage! ^_^
I’m Yee Ching, a Communications and New Media student studying at the National University of Singapore!
As someone who loves to express myself in creative ways, be it in written or visual forms, I’m keen to explore a career in the communications and marketing industry.
Beyond my career aspirations, in my free time, you’ll probably catch me doodling away on my iPad, playing with my terrapin, watching shows, or napping away…zzz.

title: Project Diary
text:
As an avid K-Drama watcher, I felt compelled to explore the topic of Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas, and answer the question of, What makes K-Drama popular?.
Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.





K-Drama’s degree of popularity worldwide as of December 2022: https://www.statista.com/statistics/999239/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-worldwide/

1.1 America 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017862/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-us/
1.2 Japan 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017819/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-japan/
1.3 Thailand 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017828/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-thailand/
1.4 China 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017829/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-china/
1.5 Russia 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017888/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-russia/

Top 100 K-Dramas users have ranked on MyDramaList, featuring variables like Name, Year of Release, Aired Date, Aired On, Number of Episode, Network, Duration, Content Rating, Synopsis, Cast, Genre, Tags, Rank, Rating: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/top-100-korean-drama-mydramalist
Information about dramas (Drama Name, Year, Synopsis, Genres, Tags, Director, Screen writer, Country ect) and user reviews (Ratings on the story, Acting cast, Music, Rewatch Value, Overall, Number of episodes watched etc) from Korea, Japan, and Thailand: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv
Top 5000 Asian Dramas from Korea, Japan, China, Taiwan, and Thailand, featuring variables like Name, Episodes, Released Year, Language, Rating, Ranking: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/lakshmiindukosuri/top-5000-dramas-1983-2023
Popular over the top media services for accessing K-Dramas worldwide in 2022: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/999315/south-korea-ott-services-for-accessing-korean-dramas-worldwide/

title: Final Project: What makes K-Dramas so popular globally?

title: Project Diary
text:
1. Finalised Topic
As an avid K-Drama watcher, I felt compelled to explore the topic of Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas.
Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.

title: Project Diary
text:
2. Identified Datasets

K-Drama’s degree of popularity worldwide as of December 2022: https://www.statista.com/statistics/999239/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-worldwide/

1.1 America 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017862/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-us/
1.2 Japan 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017819/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-japan/
1.3 Thailand 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017828/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-thailand/
1.4 China 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017829/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-china/
1.5 Russia 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017888/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-russia/

Top 100 K-Dramas users have ranked on MyDramaList, featuring variables like Name, Year of Release, Aired Date, Aired On, Number of Episode, Network, Duration, Content Rating, Synopsis, Cast, Genre, Tags, Rank, Rating: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/top-100-korean-drama-mydramalist
Information about dramas (Drama Name, Year, Synopsis, Genres, Tags, Director, Screen writer, Country ect) and user reviews (Ratings on the story, Acting cast, Music, Rewatch Value, Overall, Number of episodes watched etc) from Korea, Japan, and Thailand: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv
Top 5000 Asian Dramas from Korea, Japan, China, Taiwan, and Thailand, featuring variables like Name, Episodes, Released Year, Language, Rating, Ranking: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/lakshmiindukosuri/top-5000-dramas-1983-2023
Popular over the top media services for accessing K-Dramas worldwide in 2022: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/999315/south-korea-ott-services-for-accessing-korean-dramas-worldwide/

title: Week 8 Project Submission
text: The topic that I have selected is on Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas, and the question of, “What makes K-Drama popular?”. Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.

title: Week 8 Project Submission
text: The topic that I have selected is on Korean Dramas, also known as K-Dramas, and the question of, “What makes K-Drama popular?”. Through a factors-type data-story, I will explain the popularity of K-Dramas by analysing and showcasing the specific factors that have contributed to its popularity.

title: Week 8 Project Submission
text:
2. Data Sources
These are the data sources that I have curated so far:

K-Drama’s degree of popularity worldwide as of December 2022: https://www.statista.com/statistics/999239/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-worldwide/
America 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017862/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-us/
Japan 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017819/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-japan/
Thailand 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017828/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-thailand/
China 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017829/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-china/
Russia 2019: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/1017888/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-russia/
Top 100 K-Dramas users have ranked on MyDramaList, featuring variables like Name, Year of Release, Aired Date, Aired On, Number of Episode, Network, Duration, Content Rating, Synopsis, Cast, Genre, Tags, Rank, Rating: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/top-100-korean-drama-mydramalist
Information about dramas (Drama Name, Year, Synopsis, Genres, Tags, Director, Screen writer, Country ect) and user reviews (Ratings on the story, Acting cast, Music, Rewatch Value, Overall, Number of episodes watched etc) from Korea, Japan, and Thailand, which may be useful for comparison across countries: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv
Top 5000 Asian Dramas from Korea, Japan, China, Taiwan, and Thailand, featuring variables like Name, Episodes, Released Year, Language, Rating, Ranking: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/lakshmiindukosuri/top-5000-dramas-1983-2023
Popular over the top media services for accessing K-Dramas worldwide in 2022: https://www-statista-com.libproxy1.nus.edu.sg/statistics/999315/south-korea-ott-services-for-accessing-korean-dramas-worldwide/

title: Week 8 Project Submission
text:
Published Webpage Link
https://yeech1ng.github.io/

title: Project Diary
section: 1. Question I am going to answer:
text:
1. Question I am going to answer:
What makes K-Dramas so popular globally?

title: Project Diary
section: 2. Why is this an important question?
text:
2. Why is this an important question?

Governments can understand how to use its entertainment industry to expand its soft power like South Korea, evident in how K-Dramas have become a global culture phenomenon with immense international viewership, according to Statista’s 2022 findings that 66% of respondents surveyed across 26 countries felt that K-Dramas were popular outside of dedicated fan circles. https://www.statista.com/statistics/999239/south-korea-korean-drama-popularity-worldwide/
Policymakers can learn content and media strategies, and apply them to their own countries’ entertainment industry to achieve economic gains just like South Korea, where according to the Ministry of Science and ICT and the Korea Communications Commission, $561.3 million worth of Korean Television content was sold abroad in 2022, demonstrating K-Dramas’ capability of generating substantial financial gains for the South Korean economy. https://www.koreaherald.com/view.php?ud=20231225000165
It prompts us to consider how we can use K-Dramas to widen outreach to support individuals with mental health issues given K-Dramas’ immense potential as a social marketing tool to educate communities on mental health and school bullying, according to the National Library of Medicine. https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC7084599/

title: Project Diary
section: 3. Which rows and columns of the dataset will be used to answer this question?
text:
3. Which rows and columns of the dataset will be used to answer this question?
As there are bits of information I want to use across different datasets, I will be using several datasets to get a deeper understanding of K-Dramas, and a broader understanding of K-Dramas as compared to Thailand and Japanese Dramas.
Data Sources on K-Dramas only:
From this dataset: https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/top-100-korean-drama-mydramalist

Rows: 2 to 101
Columns: Name, Aired On, Number of Episode, Network, Duration, Cast, Genre, Tags, Rank, Rating

From this dataset: kor_user_review https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv

Rows: 2 to 16790
Columns: title, story, acting_cast, music, rewatch_value, overall, text, ep_watched

From this dataset: kor_kor_actors https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv

Rows: 2 to 8752
Columns: actor_name, drama_name

From this dataset: kor_drama https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv

Rows: 2 to 1774
Columns: drama_name, year, genres, tags, tot_eps, org_net, tot_user_score, tot_num_user, rank, popularity

Data Sources for Comparison across region:
From this dataset: top_5000_drama https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/lakshmiindukosuri/top-5000-dramas-1983-2023

Rows: 2 to 5001
Columns: Name, Language, Rating, Ranking, Episodes, Released Year
Filter out dramas which are released before 2015 since I am looking at the range of 2015-2023

From this dataset: tha_drama https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv

Rows: 2 to 1532
Columns: drama_name, year, genres, tags, tot_eps, org_net, tot_user_score, tot_num_user, rank, popularity

From this dataset: jap_drama https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/chanoncharuchinda/thai-and-japanese-drama-vs-korean-drama-dominance?select=kor_user_reviews.csv

Rows: 2 to 2139
Columns: drama_name, year, genres, tags, tot_eps, org_net, tot_user_score, total_num_user, rank, popularity

title: Project Diary
section: 4. Challenges and How I Overcame Them
text:
4. Challenges and How I Overcame Them
Given the many datasets I have, I was unsure if I should include certain datasets on Thai and Japanese dramas and their respective user reviews and actor information, as they are not directly related to the question. I eventually decided to only select information that would be useful for a more comprehensive analysis and comparison across different cultural contexts – basic information like the name, year the drama was released, genres, tags, total number of episodes, and other ranking and reviews from users.
If I realise I require additional information for comparison in the future, I will include more information on user reviews on Thai and Japanese dramas. Similarly, if I realise the amount of data I have now is excessive and unnecessary to investigate the factors behind the popularity of K-Dramas globally, I will remove these datasets on Thai and Japanese Dramas

4. Challenges and How I overcame them
Given the many datasets I have, I was unsure if I should include certain datasets on Thai and Japanese dramas and their respective user reviews and actor information, as they are not directly related to the question. I eventually decided to only select information that would be useful for a more comprehensive analysis and comparison across different cultural contexts – basic information like the name, year the drama was released, genres, tags, total number of episodes, and other ranking and reviews from users.
If I realise I require additional information for comparison in the future, I will include more information on user reviews on Thai and Japanese dramas. Similarly, if I realise the amount of data I have now is excessive and unnecessary to investigate the factors behind the popularity of K-Dramas globally, I will remove these datasets on Thai and Japanese Dramas.
